name: Procurement Center Review
description: Procurement centre review of request, prior to supplier questionnaire being sent

description: Please the complete EHS / Animal Welfare if applicable.

description:

name: Supplier questionnaire, compliance checks and Payment terms (Non-standard) approval

name: Supplier onboarding on hold as information security assessment result not approved
description: Please be informed that Supplier onboarding on hold as information security

name: IT Assessment Confirmation
description: Please confirm that the Status of IT Supplier based on Information Security Assessment result is 'Approved' as it was put on Hold.
